thread.title: CORRECTED-Brazil's BRF posts smaller-than-expected 2nd-quarter profit
thread.title_full: CORRECTED-Brazil's BRF posts smaller-than-expected 2nd-quarter profit | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: CORRECTED-Brazil's BRF posts smaller-than-expected 2nd-quarter profit
text:
(Corrects to say EBITDA was slightly above, not below, analysts' forecast)
SAO PAULO, July 30 (Reuters) - BRF SA, the world's largest chicken exporter, on Thursday posted a second-quarter profit of 364 mln reais ($108 million), well below the 437 million reais expected by analysts.
Earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation and amortization, a measure of operational efficiency known as EBITDA, rose 43.6 percent from a year ago to 1.38 bln reais ($409 million), slightly above the 1.3 billion reais analysts polled by Reuters had forecast. (Reporting by Marcelo Teixeira; Editing by Leslie Adler and Dan Grebler)
